coffees.name: Oat Latte
coffees.description: Latte coffee with oat plant milk.

coffees.name: Toasted Graham Latte
coffees.description: Graham and sweet cream meet steamed milk and our signature espresso, then are finished off with a sprinkling of cinnamon graham crumbles for a less sweet perfect treat.

coffees.name: Soy Latte
coffees.description: Latte coffee with soy plant milk.

coffees.name: Rice Latte
coffees.description: Latte coffee with rice plant milk.

coffees.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
coffees.description: Our signature espresso and milk are highlighted by flavor notes of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove to create this incredible beverage that's a fall favorite. Enjoy it topped with whipped cream and real pumpkin pie spices.

coffees.name: Salted Caramel Mocha
coffees.description: Our signature espresso and milk are highlighted by flavor notes of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove to create this incredible beverage that's a fall favorite. Enjoy it topped with whipped cream and real pumpkin pie spices.
